item.title: Stardust Skate
item.description:
Title: Stardust Skate
Genre: Indie , Sports , Strategy
Developer: VchiBan , Aetha
Publisher: VchiBan
Release Date: Mar 21, 2025




About This Game

Blitz through Stardust Valley , experiencing everything from the spooky forest of Blackthorn Mire to the sunny sands of Beachwood -- and more! Perform sick tricks and skillful maneuvers to earn currency to unlock new boards.

Unique Skating Styles

Pick from 4 different skaters of VchiBan with their own unique powers and abilities to find the shredding style that grooves with you~!

Features:

  • 90s inspired visuals

  • Arcade style endless runner

  • Original soundtrack

  • 40+ unique boards to unlock

  • Steam leaderboards

item.title: KAISERPUNK
item.description:
Title: KAISERPUNK
Genre: Simulation , Strategy
Developer: Overseer Games
Publisher: Overseer Games , Elda Entertainment
Franchise: Top Indie Developers , Masters Of Indie
Release Date: Mar 21, 2025




About This Game

Build your city, forge your empire, and conquer the world in Kaiserpunk , the Grand City Builder set in an alternative history from 1918 to 1945 – the 'Interbellum Era'. After WWI, city-states rise from the ashes, each vying for dominance.

As a ruler, you'll manage your city, drive its industrialization, and build a military across land, sea, and air to conquer rivals or defend your territory. With deep production focused city building and warfare on a global scale, the way you develop your city will determine your ability to dominate through war or engage in diplomacy.

Grand City Building in an Alternative 20th Century

Shape your city from the ground up. Build housing, set up logistics, establish industry, provide public services and connect your city. From simple zeppelins to mighty bombers, new technology unlocks over 90 buildings and many different upgrades based on how you build your city. Keep the morale of the citizens high, ensure they’re employed, and have them contribute to the economy as your 20th-century metropolis rises to greatness.

Warfare on a Global Scale

As your city-state rises from the ashes of the Great War, you’ll encounter other emerging city-states, each vying for power. Will you forge alliances through trade and diplomacy, or seize dominance through open conflict with your rivals?

With 100 different regions to conquer, choose your strategies wisely and harness your resources to wage war across land, sea, and air—expanding the influence of your great empire.

Be a Captain of Industry

From trees to newspapers and ore to bullets, your city's industries must run efficiently—and it's up to you to make it happen.

Fine-tune your economy, trade, and manage over 90 deep, interconnected production chains that scale effortlessly to meet the demands of your growing empire. Set up efficient logistics and ensure your goods reach the right destinations, even experienced armies lacking supplies will get you nowhere. Complexity meets clarity, allowing you to expand without feeling overwhelmed.

Shape Your City, Forge Your Empire

As your city expands, so does your empire’s identity —shaped by the choices you make. Your decisions carry weight across time; from industrial priorities to political decisions, every aspect of your leadership influences the world around you. Build a capital that reflects your vision and steers your empire’s future.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:

    • Processor: Intel™ Core i5-7400 or AMD Ryzen™ 5 1600

    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050ti / AMD Radeon R7 370

    • Additional Notes: SSD is recommended
    Recommended:

    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 / AMD Radeon RX 5600 XT
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Storage: 20 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: SSD is recommended

item.title: Urban Jungle
item.description:
Title: Urban Jungle
Genre: Casual , Indie , Simulation
Developer: Kylyk Games
Publisher: Assemble Entertainment
Franchise: Assemble Entertainment
Release Date: Mar 21, 2025




About This Game

Urban Jungle is a charming and relaxing simulation game that invites you to transform small, ordinary apartments into lush, green havens by placing delightful plants with savvy. But no worries, you won’t have to deal with watering or pest control – the plants just need a good spot, and that's enough to create the comfiest and coziest home of them all. Oh, and don’t forget to pet your cat!

  • Decorate with Plants: The core gameplay revolves around arranging a diverse selection of plants in your apartment. Each plant can be placed in different spots, challenging you to find the optimal placement to enhance the room’s coziness and aesthetics.

  • Puzzle Elements: While the game is primarily about decoration, it includes puzzle-like aspects. You’ll need to think strategically about where to place each plant to maximize the comfort and visual appeal of your home, ultimately unlocking new plants.

  • Relaxing Atmosphere: Urban Jungle is designed to be a stress-free experience. There are no time limits or high-pressure scenarios. You can move plants around freely and adjust your setup at your own pace.

  • Environmental Storytelling: The game’s narrative is subtly woven into the environment. As you progress, you’ll uncover pieces of a heartwarming story that unfolds across the different stages of the protagonist's life.

  • Interactive Elements: In addition to plants, you can interact with other items like lamps and humidifiers to alter the ambiance of your apartment, further enhancing the cozy feeling.

Why You'll Love Urban Jungle

Urban Jungle is perfect for players seeking a wholesome and meditative gaming experience. The simple yet engaging gameplay, combined with the delightful visuals and calming music, creates an oasis of tranquility. Whether you’re an avid gardener in real life or someone who simply loves cozy spaces, Urban Jungle offers a beautiful blend of creativity, relaxation, and gentle storytelling.

Immerse yourself in the serene joy of plant decoration, where every decision brings your apartment closer to becoming a perfect green sanctuary.

Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: Windows 10
    • Processor: Intel i5-6400
    • Memory: 4 GB RAM
    • Graphics: GTX 1060
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 1 GB available space

item.title: Iron Saga VS
item.description:
Title: Iron Saga VS
Genre: Action
Developer: Gameduchy
Publisher: Gameduchy
Release Date: Mar 21, 2025




About This Game

With red-hot sparks, laser swords and rocket-propelled fists, a modern Mecha fighting game finally appears! Iron Saga, Game Duchy's mech-themed mobile game, spins off into its Versus version: Iron Saga VS!

As a modern fighting game, it features robust rollback online play.

﻿

=NEW AND CLASSIC MECHA!=

12 powerful mechs are at your disposal to pilot, including some from classic anime series!

﻿ [Mazinger Z series]

  • Mazinger Z

  • Great Mazinger

  • Boss Borot

[Shin Getter Robo Armageddon series]

  • Getter Robo

[Super Beast Machine God Dancouga series]

  • Dancouga

[Iron Saga series]

  • Vassago

  • Kaguya

  • Qing Long

  • Susanoo

  • Mephisto

  • Wu Shuang

  • Nero

﻿

=ARSENAL SYSTEM=

Each of the playable mechs in Iron Saga VS can be outfitted with one of two unique Arsenals , altering their special move list and dramatically changing their gameplay. Will you use Mazinger Z's missile arsenal "Bat A Thousand" or his photon power eye beam charged "Photon Power Commands"?

﻿

= POWERFUL COMBOS AND SUPERMOVES =

Fill your EN bar in combat to use your stronger Energy Moves, take advantage of Flash Counters to unleash powerful combos and unleash your Power Max Supermove to finish your opponent off! But in dire times, you also have access to your Awakening Supermove ... will it be enough to turn the tides of the battle? Many control options also allow for basic combos to be easily accessible to players of all skill levels!

﻿

=ADVENTURE ON WITH YOUR FAVORITE MECHA=

Discover the lore behind your Mecha and its pilot in Arcade Mode, fulfill your missions' objectives in the increasingly challenging Simulacrum Chronicle, learn the best techniques in the Pilot Academy or master your own techniques in the robust Training mode!

﻿

=COMPETE WITH NEW AND OLD FRIENDS=

Fight against an AI or friend offline in the VS mode, or meet online in a public regional or private lobby!

All online play features smooth rollback netcode.

Quickly meet new opponents in either casual or ranked matchmaking. Can you reach the rank of Grandmaster?

﻿

Now get in the robot and fight, Commander!

item.title: Atelier Yumia: The Alchemist of Memories & the Envisioned Land
item.description:
Title: Atelier Yumia: The Alchemist of Memories & the Envisioned Land
Genre: Action , Adventure , RPG
Developer: KOEI TECMO GAMES CO., LTD.
Publisher: KOEI TECMO GAMES CO., LTD.
Franchise: KOEI TECMO GAMES CO., LTD.
Release Date: Mar 20, 2025




About This Game

Walk the forbidden path, no matter where it leads.

"Atelier Yumia" is a story about Yumia and her companions confronting memories and, despite their uncertainties, forging ahead on the path they believe in.

System:

Collect, battle, create—
Experience it all on your journey with friends.

- Freely traverse the vast open field in all directions.

The continent is an unexplored land where the player can use a wide range of items and actions to forge their path forward.

- Battle
Ranges and items allow for a captivating variety of actions in combat.

You will be tested on your ability to make split-second decisions during real-time combat.
Fight strategically utilizing two types of attack ranges which change your skills as your switch between them.
Additionally, synthesized items will transform into weapons like swords and spears, which can be used to attack. Items can be reused any number of times, so don't hesitate to deploy them while driving away enemies that stand in your way.

- Synthesis
Weave together mana to create items.

Manipulate the mana contained within ingredients to create new items based on recipes.
The items you craft will exhibit powerful effects in various situations, such as exploration and combat.
The strength of an item's power depends on the ingredients used during synthesis, so select ingredients carefully while assessing the power of their contained mana.

- Create items while out in the field and customize bases however you like!

You can use Simple Synthesis to create exploration tools for opening the path forward, as well as items that will benefit you during combat and synthesis. You can also use the Building feature to construct bases and then decorate them with furniture to your liking.

Story:

The Aladissian Empire once thrived on a certain continent, having achieved remarkable development through alchemy that kept other nations at bay. However, it met its end due to a sudden and mysterious cataclysm.

Time progressed, and several centuries later, alchemy has become known as a dangerous art that brings destruction, and is considered "evil" and "taboo."

Now, a lone alchemist takes her first step into this unexplored and perilous land. Her name is Yumia Liessfeldt, and after losing her mother in an accident three years ago, she came to learn that she descends from a line of alchemists, which left her with many questions.

Why was Aladiss destroyed?
Why did alchemy become taboo?
Is alchemy truly evil?

Believing that all the truths she seeks lie within the fallen continent, Yumia embarks on a journey to uncover its lost history.

Note: Images are taken from an in-development build. The final product may differ from what is shown.

----
Steam® version content: Atelier Yumia - Backpack Set
An accessory set for changing the color of Yumia's backpack and Flammi's smoke.

List of Contents:
- "Flammi Backpack" Accessory for Yumia
- "Memory Backpack" Accessory for Yumia
- "Twinkling Smoke" Accessory for Flammi
- "Crackling Smoke" Accessory for Flammi

Note: This content can be accessed after unlocking base building and placing a Dressing Room.
